Articles.Content:
Hey guys, 

Last few days I've been playing with Realism Overhaul, built a bunch of rockets, and now want to build a space shuttle. What mods can help me with that except mods that include an already built shuttle (CSS, project Buran etc) and Real Scale Boosters? 

Thx

B9 Aerospace.

Cormorant might also work, but Idk if its compatible with RO.

Real Scale Booster, BlueDog Industries Or Rocket Factory for Launch rockets ( Pick One because all those are huge mod) 

And 

Shuttle Lifting Bodies For STS Parts Building.
